description:
changed some Section names
edited Instrument names
Guitar:
made the Intro easier to read, improved Verses and finally figured out the Bridge ending!
Vocals:
added some details to Serj Vocals
Drums:
changed some cymbals
title: Radio/Video

description: Added a note in Serj's Vocals at the Interlude
title: Radio/Video

description: Added some Vocal details and corrected some Notes in the Bridge
title: Radio/Video

description:
Updated Lyrics (they pronounce "places" like "plaSASS" and changed the end of the la las)
Improved Vocals during the Choruses
Adjusted Volume
title: Radio/Video

description: Corrected the Guitar Riff during the Verses and Bridges
title: Radio/Video

description:
Tried to get rid of some (0) on the main Guitar
Made the rhythm Guitar in the Solo more accurate
Edited Vocals at the Interlude
Improved the Extra Guitars 1 & 2 at the Verses
title: Radio/Video

description:
Made some Guitar parts easier to read and added marks when it's Palm Muted
Added a small detail on the Bridge Vocals
Remove an extra Ride hit in the last Chorus
title: Radio/Video

description:
Guitar: added details with the low notes in the Intro, moved Distortion parts to clean to make it easier to play along, added a Slide in the Chorus.
Bass: improved Verses, added Slides to Chorus
Vocals: added more details and fixed harmony before the Bridge.
Drums: added a separate track for the Shakers, improved Cymbals, added Ghost Snares during the Guitar Solo, changed Bridges 2 and 3.
And made some BPM changes.
title: Radio/Video

description:
Added some Bends to Vocals and corrected two Notes at the Verses
Made Solo Guitar 2 a bit louder during the Verses
title: Radio/Video

description:
Edited BPM a bit
Added more Note names and Chords
Added another Solo Guitar track, edited the Solos, moved the Distortion Guitar Verses to Muted Guitar and upped the Volume, added some Slides to the Intro and Chorus
Synth Accordion now plays full chords
Made the Vocals more closely match the album version, edited the Chorus, replaced Slides with some Bends, added Harmonies to both Bridges and edited the outro
title: Radio/Video

description: Rearrenged guitars and added another clean track, overdriven guitar is too quiet so switched those parts to distortion guitar and turned the voume a bit down to make up, drums are readeable again! with some details, live solo on muted guitar now! Added note names to vocals and accordion and tuned them to standard, accordion plays during the verses now too and edited details in the chorus
title: Radio/Video

description: Rewritten vocals now with lyrics, added separate Serj track, added vocals to bridge, edited the bass a bit in the bridge, Intro and Solo guitar is how Daron plays it, added details to Distortion guitar chorus riff, added more guitar tracks to complete the bridge (Live solo at distortion guitar just for fun) took me a while to get this done, the only thing I didnt' touch was the drums except for the last note that didn't save properly.
title: Radio/Video

description: Pitched one octave up malakian's vocals
title: Radio/Video

description: GuitarPro doesn't show errors. Vocals should be in sync.

description: Tried to fix the vocal by changing it to a sawtooth.. Hope it sounds better
